_header: Some time men readen that there was
Title(s): ‘De duobus veris amicis’; South English Legendary
_description: ‘De duobus veris amicis’ (in Sithia and Climonen, part of 699)

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
Sum tyme men reden þat þer wasIn a Cuntre clept
                    Pictogoras…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þis lyf endyted Seint AmbroseOn latyn tak hede to his
                    purpose
